N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 461.3 - Authorization

State Regulations
(a) For recipients
of HR and ADC, services staff shall transmit a request to income maintenance to
authorize inclusion of the additional cost of home-delivered meals in the
grant. (b) For beneficiaries of SSI
who were former recipients of AABD and had an allowance included within the
grant for home-delivered meals when their cases were transferred to the SSI
program, the allowance was included under the "hold-harmless" provisions. No
authorization is required. (c) For
all other SSI beneficiaries, services staff shall prepare an authorization
which shall include the number of meals authorized, period of authorization, name of provider and cost of service. Notes
